channel.title: BROKEN JOYSTICK in my package (broken parts)
channel.description:
hi everyone, happy to be here :slight_smile: i would like to start a new conversation i found a broken part in my package: the joystick :sob: do u know where i can find another? can i buy via thonk?
thanks a lot to everyone for the answers :slight_smile:
